CustomField.description: Formula = QS_Subscription__r.SBQQ__RenewedDate__c. Shows the renewed date of the source Subscription record (if CAT was creted from a Subscription). Will always be blank if the CAT represents a non-recurring product.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula = QS_Subscription__r.SBQQ__RenewedDate__c. Shows the renewed date of the source Subscription record (if CAT was creted from a Subscription). Will always be blank if the CAT represents a non-recurring product.
CustomField.label: Renewed Date
